content.text:
# Harold C. Edwards

Harold Clifford Edwards  (hon.) (15 August 1899 – 2 August 1989) was a British surgeon. His sons were the geneticists John H. Edwards (1928–2007) and A. W. F. Edwards (1935–). He was awarded a Commander of the Order of the British Empire in 1945.
References
*
* EDWARDS, Harold Clifford, Who Was Who, A & C Black, an imprint of Bloomsbury Publishing plc, 1920–2008; online edn, Oxford University Press, Dec 2007 [http://www.ukwhoswho.com/view/article/oupww/whowaswho/U163840 accessed 20 April 2013]
* [http://www.npg.org.uk/collections/search/person/mp71915/harold-clifford-edwards npg.org.uk]
* [http://livesonline.rcseng.ac.uk/biogs/E007244b.htm Plarr's Lives of the Fellows]
